column1: * 1954 - Author and scholar Guy Gavriel Kay is born.
* 1964 - The fifth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Gene Wolfe.
* 1969 - Vera Chapman announces the foundation of The Tolkien Society in the New Statesman.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
